high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.utils.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods needed during code-generation.

    • Method Detail

      • internalName

        public static java.lang.String internalName(IReferenceType type)
        This method computes the internal name of a type.

        Example: "java.lang.String" returns "java/lang/String"
        Example: "java.lang.String[]" returns "[Ljava/lang/String;"

        Parameters:
        type - is the type whose internal name is requested.
        Returns:
        the internal name of the type.

      • sourceName

        public static java.lang.String sourceName(IExpressionType type)
        This method computes the name of a type as it appears in the source-code.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type whose name is requested.
        Returns:
        the name of the type as it appears in source-code.

      • selectReturnInsn

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode selectReturnInsn(IReturnType type)
        This method selects the appropriate "return" bytecode instruction for a given type.

        This method will return a RETURN instruction, if the type is void.

        Parameters:
        type - is the type of value that will be returned.
        Returns:
        the bytecode "return" instruction that is used for the given type.

      • selectLoadVarInsn

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode selectLoadVarInsn(IVariableType type,
                                                        int address)
        This method selects the appropriate bytecode instruction to load a variable.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of the variable.
        address - is the address of the variable.
        Returns:
        the appropriate load instruction.

      • selectStoreVarInsn

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode selectStoreVarInsn(IVariableType type,
                                                         int address)
        This method selects the appropriate bytecode instruction to store a value in a variable.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of the variable.
        address - is the address of the variable.
        Returns:
        the appropriate store instruction.

      • ldcClass

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode ldcClass(IType type)
        This method creates a bytecode instruction that loads a class-literal onto the operand-stack.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type that the class-literal represents.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed bytecode instruction.

      • sizeof

        public static int sizeof(IType type)
        This method determines the amount of storage needed for a variable.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type whose size will be determined.
        Returns:
        the amount of space needed to store a value of the given type.

      • selectPop

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode selectPop(IType type)
        This method selects a bytecode instruction to pop a value off of the operand-stack.

        This method returns a NOP instruction, if the type is the void type.

        Parameters:
        type - is the type of value that will be popped off of the stack.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed bytecode instruction.

      • keywords

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keywords()
        This method retrieves the set of words that are reserved in the Java programming language.
        Returns:
        the immutable set of reserved words.

      • isKeyword

        public static boolean isKeyword(java.lang.String word)
        This method determines whether a word is a keyword in the Java programming language.
        Parameters:
        word - is the word that may be a keyword.
        Returns:
        true, iff the word is a reserved keyword.

      • ldcDefault

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode ldcDefault(IType type)
        This method selects a bytecode instruction to push a default value onto the operand-stack.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of the default value.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed instruction.

      • pushArgument

        public static void pushArgument(ProgramCompiler program,
                org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code,
                IExpressionType type)
        This method generates bytecode to invoke the "push" method of an ArgumentStack.
        Parameters:
        program - is the program being compiled.
        code - is the list of generated bytecode to add instructions to.
        type - is the type of the value being pushed.

      • peekArgument

        public static void peekArgument(ProgramCompiler program,
                org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code,
                IExpressionType type)
        This method generates bytecode to retrieve a value from an ArgumentStack.

        If the value is a reference type, then it will be downcast.

        Parameters:
        program - is the program being compiled.
        code - is the list of generated bytecode to add instructions to.
        type - is the type of the value that will be retrieved.

      • popArgument

        public static void popArgument(ProgramCompiler program,
               org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code)
        This method generates bytecode to pop a value off of an ArgumentStack.
        Parameters:
        program - is the program being compiled.
        code - is the list of generated bytecode to add instructions to.

      • getArgument

        public static void getArgument(ProgramCompiler program,
               org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code,
               IExpressionType type,
               int index)
        This method generates bytecode to retrieve a value from an ArgumentStack at a given index.

        The index is numbered from the base of the stack. So, index zero is the bottommost element.

        If the value is a reference type, then it will be downcast.

        Parameters:
        program - is the program being compiled.
        code - is the list of generated bytecode to add instructions to.
        type - is the type of the value that will be retrieved.
        index - is the index of the argument to retrieve.

      • appendToInsnList

        public static void appendToInsnList(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList out,
                    java.lang.Iterable<org.objectweb.asm.tree.AbstractInsnNode> addendum)
        This method appends a list of instructions onto another list of instructions.
        Parameters:
        out - is the list that will have elements added to it.
        addendum - are the elements to add to the other list.

      • loadDelegate

        public static void loadDelegate(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code,
                IClassType module,
                java.lang.String method)
        This method generates the bytecode needed to load a delegate onto the operand-stack.
        Parameters:
        code - is the list of bytecode instructions to append the generated code onto.
        module - is the type of the module that contains the delegated function.
        method - is the name of the delegated function.

      • bytecodeOf

        public static org.objectweb.asm.tree.MethodNode bytecodeOf(ModuleCompiler module,
                                           IInvokableMember member)
        This method creates the bytecode representation of a constructor or method.
        Parameters:
        module - is essentially the module that is being compiled.
        member - is the type-system representation of the constructor or method.
        Returns:
        the bytecode representation of the

      • invoke

        public static void invoke(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code,
          int opcode,
          java.lang.Class owner,
          java.lang.Class returns,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.Class... parameters)
        This method creates a bytecode instruction that invokes a method.
        Parameters:
        code - is the list of bytecode instruction to append the instruction onto.
        opcode - is the opcode of the new instruction.
        owner - is the type where the method is declared.
        returns - is the return type of the method.
        name - is the name of the method.
        parameters - are the types of the method's parameters.

      • makeListImmutable

        public static void makeListImmutable(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code)
        This method generates bytecode that makes a list immutable.
        Parameters:
        code - is the list of bytecode instruction to append the instruction onto.

      • loadArgumentStack

        public static void loadArgumentStack(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList code)
        This method generates the bytecode necessary to load the current thread's argument-stack onto the operand-stack.
        Parameters:
        code - is the code being generated.
